clauses.title: Prices and fees may be changed at any time, without notice to you
clauses.description: The service reserves the right to change or modify its pricing and fees at any time, and such changes are effective immediately without need for further notice to the user.
clauses.clause_text: GoDaddy expressly reserves the right to change or modify its prices and fees at any time, and such changes or modifications shall be posted online at this Site and effective immediately without need for further notice to you.

case.text: Prices and fees may be changed at any time, without notice to you

clauses.title: You must provide your identifiable information
clauses.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that for each domain name registered by you, the following contact data is required: postal address, email address, telephone number, and if available, a facsimile number for the Registered Name Holder and, if different from the Registered Name Holder, the same contact information for, a technical contact, an administrative contact and a billing contact.

case.text: You must provide your identifiable information

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Advertising technology may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information on the effectiveness of our marketing efforts, deliver personalized content

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text:
such as:

  • Processing credit card payments
  • Serving advertisements
  • Conducting contests or surveys
  • Performing analysis of our Services and customers demographics

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text:
We retain personal information only for as long as necessary to provide the Services you have requested and thereafter for a variety of legitimate legal or business purposes. These might include retention periods:

  • mandated by law, contract or similar obligations applicable to our business operations;

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: They may notify, but without any guarantee.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text: or to generate data that allows for the delivery of advertising relevant to your specific interests on our sites, as well as third-party websites.

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: Your account and domains can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: A list of reasons is provided below that quote, but it is so long that anything could be considered as a good reason to block a domain or account.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Also: "Performance: Performance technologies may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information about how you use our website (pages you visit, if you experience any errors, load times)."

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text:
We may also contact you with offers for additional services we think you’ll find valuable if you give us consent, or where allowed based upon legitimate interests. You don’t need to provide consent as a condition to purchase our goods or services. These contacts may include:

  • Email
  • Text (SMS) messages
  • Telephone calls
  • Messenger applications (e.g. WhatsApp, etc.)
  • Automated phone calls or text messages.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: You and GoDaddy further agree: (i) to arbitrate all Disputes between the parties pursuant to the provisions in these Terms.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text:
We will also disclose your information to third parties:

  • in the event that we sell or buy any business or assets (whether a result of liquidation, bankruptcy or otherwise),

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text:
or
  • participate in contests and surveys, apply for a job, or otherwise participate in activities we promote that might require information about you.

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may share your personal information with affiliated companies within our corporate family, with third parties with which we have partnered to allow you to integrate their services into our own Services, and with trusted third party service providers as necessary for them to perform services on our behalf

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: If you wish to opt out of interest-based advertising click here [or if located in the European Union click here].

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government
clauses.description: Countries under embargo or banned by the government of the country in question cannot use the service.
clauses.clause_text:
None of the Services found at this Site may be downloaded or otherwise exported or re-exported (i) into (or to a national or resident of) any country with which the United States has embargoed trade.
or (ii) to anyone on the U.S.
Treasury Department's list of Specially Designated Nationals or the U.S.
Commerce Department's Denied Persons List, or any other denied parties lists under U.S.
Export Laws.

case.text: The service is only available in some countries approved by its government

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: Performance: Performance technologies may include first or third-party cookies, web beacons/pixels, and scripts placed in order to gather information about how you use our website (pages you visit, if you experience any errors, load times). These cookies do not collect any information that could identify you and are only used to help us improve how our website works, understand the interests of our users, and measure how effective our content is by providing anonymous statistics and data regarding how our website is used.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: To easily access, view, update, delete or port your personal information, or to update your subscription preferences, please sign into your Account and visit “Account Settings.”

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text: To the extent we are legally permitted to do so, we will take reasonable steps to notify you in the event that we are required to provide your personal information to third parties as part of legal process.

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What information we collect

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our Privacy Policy, or how we handle your personal data, you may contact our Office of the Data Protection Officer by email at privacy@godaddy.com.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: While You can elect to deactivate the Service at any time, you also acknowledge and agree that the Service is subject to our Refund Policy, and that you may not be entitled to a refund

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more
clauses.clause_text: Subject to the provisions of Force Majeure below, we offer a service uptime guarantee (“Service Uptime Guarantee”) for paid services of 99.999% availability (defined below)

case.text: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You may also update your subscription preferences with respect to receiving communications from us and/or our partners by signing into your account and visiting “Account Settings” page.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless (within 30 days of demand) the Registry Operator and Registry Service Provider and their subcontractors, subsidiaries, affiliates, divisions, shareholders, directors, officers, employees, accountants, attorneys, insurers, agents, predecessors, successors and assigns, from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, losses, costs, expenses, causes of action or other liabilities of any kind, whether known or unknown, including reasonable legal and attorney’s fees and expenses, in any way arising out of, relating to, or otherwise in connection with the your domain name registration, including, without limitation, the use, registration, extension, renewal, deletion, and/or transfer thereof and/or the violation of any applicable terms or conditions governing the registration.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Revised: 10/21/2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text:
hen you register a domain name, you will have the following renewal options:

  1. Automatic Renewal. Automatic Renewal is the default setting. Domain names will automatically renew, for a period equivalent to the length of your original domain name registration, and payment will be taken from the Payment Method you have on file with GoDaddy, at GoDaddy's then current rates. Thus, if you have chosen to register your domain name for one (1) year, GoDaddy will automatically renew it for one (1) year.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: IN NO EVENT SHALL THE REGISTRY OPERATOR BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: The service has a no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.
clauses.clause_text: All membership fees are non-refundable.

case.text: The service has a no refund policy

clauses.title: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
clauses.clause_text: ou agree that these indemnification obligations shall survive the termination or expiration of the Agreement for any reason.

case.text: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: The service is provided “as is”

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a 18 years of age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: Our Services are not targeted to, intended to be consumed by or designed to entice individuals under the age of 18.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text: We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of third-party sites. Please read the privacy policy of any website you visit.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: we currently do not alter our practices when we receive a “Do Not Track” signal from a visitor’s browser.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
Full quote: "These technologies automatically collect data when you use and interact with our Services, including metadata, log files, cookie/device IDs, page load time, server response time, and approximate location information to measure website performance and improve our systems, including optimizing DNS resolution, network routing and server configurations. Specifically, interactions with the features, content and links (including those of third-parties, such as social media plugins) contained within the Services,
Internet Protocol (IP) address"

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
